spambot

Class CrawlerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • spambot.CrawlerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, Crawler

    public class CrawlerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Crawler
    Implementation of Crawler. Created with IntelliJ IDEA. User: Sam Wright Date: 10/12/2012 Time: 13:27 Implementation of Crawler, which is basically a wrapper for WebPage which allows for multiple Crawler objects to be managed by a single SpamBot (in multiple threads).

      Constructor and Description
      CrawlerImpl(SpamBot spam_bot, WebPageFactory factory)

      Gets the links recovered from the crawler.
      boolean isCrawling()
      If the crawler is waiting for a new seed (because it has just been initialised, or it has finished with its old seed) then this is false, and the crawler object is waiting.

      Stops the crawler thread.

    • Method Detail

      • isCrawling

        public boolean isCrawling()
        Description copied from interface: Crawler
        If the crawler is waiting for a new seed (because it has just been initialised, or it has finished with its old seed) then this is false, and the crawler object is waiting. Otherwise, true (and the crawler is running in another thread).
        Specified by:
        isCrawling in interface Crawler
        Returns:
        Whether the crawler is still crawling.

      • setSeed

        public void setSeed(java.lang.String seed)
        Description copied from interface: Crawler
        Sets the crawler's seed url. If the crawler is running, this will hang until it is done (to avoid this, check that "crawler.isReadyForSeed()").
        Specified by:
        setSeed in interface Crawler
        Parameters:
        seed - The new seed url.

      • getLinks

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getLinks()
        Description copied from interface: Crawler
        Gets the links recovered from the crawler. This will hang until the crawler stops running.
        Specified by:
        getLinks in interface Crawler
        Returns:
        The links the crawler found.

      • getEmails

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getEmails()
        Description copied from interface: Crawler
        Gets the emails recovered from the crawler. This will hang until the crawler stops running.
        Specified by:
        getEmails in interface Crawler
        Returns:
        The emails the crawler found.

      • kill

        public void kill()
        Description copied from interface: Crawler
        Stops the crawler thread. If the crawler is still running, this will hang until it finishes.
        Specified by:
        kill in interface Crawler

      • run

        public void run()
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
